name: Heart of Crown: Fairy Garden
description: Heart of Crown: Fairy Garden is a standalone expansion for Heart of Crown that contains all the cards from the base game to play on its own, and may be integrated with the cards of the base game and the other Heart of Crown expansions.
A full set of the basic cards necessary to play the game:
6 Princess Cards, reprinted from the base game and incorporating the latest revisions to their game text.
Imperial Crown (reprinted from the base game)
Fairy Queen Elrune (replaces "Imperial Karikuma" from the base game)
30 new types of Common Card (5 of each card)
30 Randomizer Cards (1 for each new type of Common Card)
